column4: I mean on wordpress, I don't think it is an executable that can be run in a gui way
what do i need to do?
I don't know but I think you have to log into wordpress from your browser to set it up

I suggest you google for how to set up a blog with wordpress, if you plan on running a blog off of your computer you need to set up apache, mysql, and php and set them up, you cant just run a program called wordpress and get instant blog, it takes a little effort
